column4: i keep getting ln: failed to create symbolic link `/dev/null': File exists when linking a log file to dev null
on 12.04, how can i fix this?
Unless you have another way of destroying openSSH logs?
which config file? because its not sshd_config
which is why i wanted to /dev/null syslog
but T_H_X i get the error of 'File Exists'
to dev null syslog you do ln -s /dev/null /var/log/syslog
